articles.title: Democratic Senate hopeful O’Rourke talks issues and his campaign challenging Ted Cruz
articles.description: McALLEN — Ten months from the 2018 midterm elections, Democratic Senate hopeful and U.S. Rep. Beto O’Rourke, D-El Paso, has been holding town halls across the state, hoping to hit all 254 Texas counties.

articles.title: Democratic Senate hopeful stumps across Rio Grande Valley
articles.description: MISSION — The senate candidate climbed onto the back of a John Deere Gator utility vehicle, crossed his legs and soon saw the start of federal construction he had no idea existed.

articles.author: Keri Blakinger
articles.title: 'See y'all on the other side': San Antonio lovers' lane killer executed amid claims of innocence - Chron.com
articles.description: Chron.com 'See y'all on the other side': San Antonio lovers' lane killer executed amid claims of innocence Chron.com HUNTSVILLE - After three canceled death dates in one year, lovers' lane killer Juan Castillo was executed Wednesday night after years of prote…
